name: Betetrised
description:
Tetris meets Bejeweled in this space-clearing puzzle game. Clearing lines or match 4 or more blocks of the same color to score points by manipulating the falling pieces or by swapping blocks that have already landed. Try to rack up combos for extra points!

Created using Pyxel Engine for #PyxelJam2021

Controls
  • W, D: Shift current piece left or right.
  • Q: Rotate current piece counterclockwise.
  • E: Rotate current piece clockwise.
  • S: Soft drop.
  • Space: Hard drop.
  • Mouse, arrow keys: Move cursor.
  • Enter: Start game, select blocks to swap.
  • Backspace: Pause game.
